name: Gospel Ambition - Impact Map
author: Disciple.Tools
upgrade_notice: Upgrade to get the latest features.

sections.description: This plugin adds an Impact Map to the Disciple.Tools Theme. The Impact Map is a visual representation of the relationships between people and groups in your ministry. It is a powerful tool for understanding the connections between people and groups and for tracking the spread of the Gospel.
sections.installation: (Required) Install the Disciple.Tools Theme. (Recommended) Install the Disciple.Tools Theme Extensions plugin. (Recommended) Install the Disciple.Tools Theme Extensions - Impact Map plugin.
